definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: confine, bind, besiege (NH id., wrap (rare); Aram. [[חוּר]] besiege, beleaguer);—
confine, secure (‖ I. [[חרר]]), acc. rei + [[ב]] of receptacle De 14:25, 2Ki 5:23, Ez Eze 5:3; complem. om. 2Ki 12:11.

shut in, besiege, c. [[עַל]] of city 2Sa 11:1, 1Ki 15:27, 1Ki 16:17, 1Ki 20:1, 2Ki 6:24, 2Ki 6:25, 2Ki 17:5, 2Ki 18:9, 2Ki 24:11, Is 29:3 (+ acc. of siege-works), Je 32:2, Je 37:5, Je 39:9, De 20:12, Ez Eze 4:3, Da 1:1; c. [[עַל]] pers. (within city) 2Sa 20:15, 2Ki 16:5, Je 21:4, Je 21:9; c. [[אֶל]] of city (for [[עַל]]) De 20:19; c. [[אֶל]] pers. 1Sa 23:8; c. [[אֵת]] of city only 1Ch 20:1 (‖ 2Sa 11:1 supr.); abs. Is 21:2.—[[הִנׇּם חָרִים אֶת־הָעִיר עָלֶיְ]] Ju Jdg 9:31 is corrupt; Frankenb:Richterbuch 28 Bu GFM:Hpt Now [[מְעִרִים]] inciting against.
shut up, enclose: [[נׇחוּר עָלֶיהָ לוּחַ אָָרֶז]] Ct So 8:9 ([[על]] of maid [under fig. of door] + acc. mater., cf. Is 29:3 supr.); c. sf. pers. Ps 139:5 (fig., ´[[י]] subj.).
